response.overview: This documentary tells the story of Raoul Wallenberg, a Swedish diplomat who traveled to Budapest in 1944 to rescue as many Jews as possible. In less then six months he managed to save thousands of Hungarian Jews from the Nazi and Arrow Cross death machinery. On 17 January 1945, during the Siege of Budapest by the Red Army, Wallenberg was arrested by Soviets SMERSH and subsequently disappeared.
response.title: Searching for Wallenberg
